alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GARFIELD AND WESTERN WHEELER COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Hartsuff State Park, or 8 miles northeast of Burwell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burwell, Ericson, Deverre, and Gables. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central Nebraska.
